original_title: Now I Close My Eyes The World I See Is So Beautiful
overview: now i close my eyes the world i see is so beautiful samples lines from Taiwanese New Wave film Yi Yi, in which a young girl speaks to the ghost of her grandmother. These intergenerational whisperings inspire April Lin to follow their own adventures with their grandfather, pondering how ancestors and descendants create bridges across time, and if you’re diasporic – across global space.
title: Now I Close My Eyes The World I See Is So Beautiful
